content: Create a song in the style of Britney Spears.

(Verse 1)  
I’m dancing in the spotlight, feel the heat tonight,  
Heart beats like a drum, under neon lights.  
Got my glitter and my glam, feeling oh so free,  
Every move I make, it’s just you and me.  

(Pre-Chorus)  
The bass is thumping, can you feel the groove?  
Everybody’s watching, they can’t help but move.  
In this electric world, we’re shining bright,  
Together on this floor, we’ll own the night.  

(Chorus)  
Ooh, baby, hit me one more time,  
We’re spinning in this rhythm, it’s a crime.  
With every heartbeat, we’re losing control,  
In this crazy world, you’re my rock ‘n’ roll.  

(Verse 2)  
Whispers in the dark, secrets that we share,  
Stolen glances, baby, I’ll meet you there.  
In this fantasy, we’re lost in the beat,  
With every step we take, it’s a love so sweet.  

(Pre-Chorus)  
The bass is thumping, can you feel the groove?  
Everybody’s watching, they can’t help but move.  
In this electric world, we’re shining bright,  
Together on this floor, we’ll own the night.  

(Chorus)  
Ooh, baby, hit me one more time,  
We’re spinning in this rhythm, it’s a crime.  
With every heartbeat, we’re losing control,  
In this crazy world, you’re my rock ‘n’ roll.  

(Bridge)  
When the music fades, and the night is through,  
I’ll be right here, waiting for you.  
In the silence, we’ll find our way,  
Two hearts in sync, come what may.  

(Chorus)  
Ooh, baby, hit me one more time,  
We’re spinning in this rhythm, it’s a crime.  
With every heartbeat, we’re losing control,  
In this crazy world, you’re my rock ‘n’ roll.  

(Outro)  
So light up the night, let our spirits fly,  
In this dance of love, we’ll never say goodbye.  
With every step, we’ll write our story bold,  
Together forever, in this world of gold.
